Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a device made from string and two cups or cans to show a string telephone.
The student can show the two students using the string telephone to communicate over a distance.
The student can depict how sound travels from one cup through the string to the other cup.
The student can add labels or symbols to demonstrate that the device uses sound to send information.
The student can include a visual or labeled description of how the solution solves the problem of communicating over a distance.
